reviews.review:
Когда уже разработчики что-то придумают с читернами?
Это действительно уже надоело!
ты просто хочешь поиграть, и тебе все равно выиграешь ты или проиграешь,
но против тебя попадается ЧЕРТ конченый который смотрит в пол и убивает всех с одной пули в голову
или другие уроды которые с ВХ смотрят в стенку и знают всю позиционку...
ЗАТО СКИНОВ У НАС МНОГО ПАРНИ,  ПОФИГ НА АНТИЧИТ ЛИШЬБЫ СКИНОВ ПОБОЛЬШЕ БЫЛО
jogo muito bom porem comunidade toxica e muitos hacks
um bom jogo incrivel na verdade te amo <3
Delicia de jogo arcadezao.. só que por estar de graça, está infestado de hacks.. infelizmente!!
JOGO  TIRO    INDIO    GOSTAR    INDIO   INDICAR
Everyone is laughing at me. Thanks valve.
Ainda prefiro o Source, mas a série soube se manter fiel às origens sem ficar desatualizada.
САМАЯ ЛУЧШАЯ ИГРА ВО ВСЕЛЕННОЙ С АК -5 В Е6ЛО ЗАМЕЧАТАЛЬНО
Эта игра помогает узнать многое о своей семье :3
really deep strategical and mechanical game, incredibly rewarding to play, amazing esports scene
Хуевая игра! НЕ ИГРАЙТЕ В ЭТУ ХУЕТУ
Inca putin si o sa bage si biolog pe counter....
jogo de tiro normal só q bom
То чувство когда купил игру за 417 рублей и ее сделали бесплатной......
its counter strike dog. Super fun to play, easy to learn, incredible hard to master
Top, entro pra me divertir e saiu puto. Melhor impossível
Tirando que esse jogo acabou com a minha vida ele é mt bom, séoloco

This game has gone downhill. If you haven't played it yet then by all means go for it, but lack of new interesting content has made this game boring. I won't be surprised if the competitive scene dies off completely in the next two years. BUT it is still one of the most satisfying shooters to date.
very cool game very nice very nice
Few games can be as satisfying or rage inducing as CSGO. Just be sure to get Prime if you can, else you have to deal with the unfortunate state of non-Prime matchmaking.
a very good game for play with friends , the graphics is so good
Hate this game, can't stop playing.
RUSH B YOU BEAUTIFULL AMAZING LADS!
Gráficos muito bem desenvolvidos, otimo desempenho em um computador normal, recomendo bastante
muito bom, tirando a quantidade enorme de hackers
Besides all the russians, hackers and smurfs it's a pretty good game :=)
Game needs a hard rank reset. Too many smurfs, and people stuck in rank decay that hardly play anymore. Also a new operation is needed.
Melhor jogo de FPS que eu já joguei. Apesar da curva de aprendizado ser maior perante ao estilo do jogo, o competitivo é o grande trunfo do game.
muit top o ruim e que tem hack de mais mais vamos la ja ja isso acaba e tudo volta ao normal
Worth the 3000 hours i've played it for.
Alap Counter-Strike játék tovább gondolása, újabb grafikai motorral, rank rendszerrel és átláthatóbb matchmakingel.

Me encanta este juego.
Y sus chiters locos que aparecen en cada partida OWO, DEMASIADO GENIAL.
